attributes.action: admit the economy is in a mess and do something about it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Everyone is aware of rising prices of food, fuel & the instabilities in the housing market.

Saying this is all due to external factors ie 'the global credit crunch' and 'rising oil prices' is not enough.

Do something now Prime Minister. Reduce fuel Tax & VAT and give the economy a boost to get it going again.

Do what the people want. Give them the incentive to do something themselves. People are literally struggling to buy enough food for their kids & buy the fuel they need to get to work. Don't be out of touch any more. Change is needed, NOW.

rejection.details: There are other similar petitions on this topic, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=reduce+tax&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=help+economy&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
